languages.text: "Мое имя знают по всей планете, мон-кай. Я — Тазарра Избавительница, Тазарра Благодетельная, та, что дарует спасение от удушающих объятий этого мира. Я решаю, кому умереть, а кому обрести новый смысл бытия на просторах арен Комморры. Разве не для этого ты здесь? Сразиться за мою переменчивую благосклонность и право первым подставить шею под кандалы?"

traits.locale_text: "Мое имя знают по всей планете, мон-кай. Я — Тазарра Избавительница, Тазарра Благодетельная, та, что дарует спасение от удушающих объятьев этого мира. Я решаю, кому умереть, а кому обрести новый смысл бытия на просторах арен Комморры. Разве не для этого ты здесь? Сразиться за мою переменчивую благосклонность и право первым подставить шею под кандалы?"

languages.text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"
languages.original_text: "Мое имя знают по всей планете, мон-кай. Я — Тазарра Избавительница, Тазарра Благодетельная, та, что дарует спасение от удушающих объятий этого мира. Я решаю, кому умереть, а кому обрести новый смысл бытия на просторах арен Комморры. Разве не для этого ты здесь? Сразиться за мою переменчивую благосклонность и право первым подставить шею под кандалы?"

I decide who lives, who dies and who finds new purpose to their existence at the Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you came here? Fight for my ever-changing favor and for the right to be the first to wear a collar?"

I decide who lives, who dies and who finds new purpose to their existence at the Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you came here? "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose to their existence at Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you came here? Fight for my ever-changing favour and for the right to be the first to put on their shackles?"

I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

languages.text: 「私の名はこの星でよく知られているのだ、モン＝ケイ。私は解放者タザーラ、慈悲深き者、息が詰まりそうなこの世界にひと時の休息を与える者だよ。生きる者、死ぬ者、そしてコモラフのいくつもある闘技場で、自分達の存在意義を新たに見出す者は私が決める。ここに来た理由もそうだろう？私の変わらぬ寵愛と、最初に鎖をかけられる名誉をかけて、戦いに来たのではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

traits.locale_text: 「私の名はこの星でよく知られているのだ、モン＝ケイ。私は解放者タザーラ、慈悲深き者、息が詰まりそうなこの世界にひと時の休息を与える者だよ。生きる者、死ぬ者、そしてコモラフのいくつもある闘技場で、自分達の存在意義を新たに見出す者は私が決める。ここに来た理由もそうだろう？私の変わらぬ寵愛と、最初に鎖をかけられる名誉をかけて、戦いに来たのではないのか？」

languages.text: “这颗行星上每个人都知道我的名字，猴子。我是塔扎菈，仁慈的拯救者，是我帮助那些活着的人，让他们从这个令人窒息的世界中获得解脱。我有权决定谁能活，谁该死，谁会踏上科摩罗的舞台，为自己的人生找到全新的目标。你之所以会来这里，想必就是为了这个原因吧？你打算通过战斗赢得我的青睐，享受第一个成为宠物的特权，对吗？”
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

traits.locale_text: “这颗行星上每个人都知道我的名字，猴子。我是塔扎菈，仁慈的拯救者，是我帮助那些活着的人，让他们从这个令人窒息的世界中获得解脱。我有权决定谁能活，谁该死，谁会踏上科摩罗的舞台，为自己的人生找到全新的目标。你之所以会来这里，想必就是为了这个原因吧？你打算通过战斗赢得我的青睐，享受第一个成为宠物的特权，对吗？”

languages.text: « Sur cette planète, tout le monde connaît mon nom, mon-keigh. Je suis Tazarra la Libératrice, Tazarra la Bienveillante, celle qui offre un répit à ceux qui veulent échapper à l'étreinte étouffante de ce monde. Qui vit, qui meurt, qui peut aspirer à une nouvelle existence dans l'arène... Il ne tient qu'à moi d'en décider. N'est-ce pas là la raison de votre venue ? Si vous vous présentez à moi, j'imagine que c'est pour vous attirer mes faveurs et ainsi obtenir le privilège d'être les premiers à être enchaînés. »
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

traits.locale_text: « Sur cette planète, tout le monde connaît mon nom, mon-keigh. Je suis Tazarra la Libératrice, Tazarra la Bienveillante, celle qui offre un répit à ceux qui veulent échapper à l'étreinte étouffante de ce monde. Qui vit, qui meurt, qui peut aspirer à une nouvelle existence dans l'arène... Il ne tient qu'à moi d'en décider. N'est-ce pas là la raison de votre venue ? Si vous vous présentez à moi, j'imagine que c'est pour vous attirer mes faveurs et ainsi obtenir le privilège d'être les premiers à être enchaînés. »

languages.text: «Todo el mundo en este planeta conoce mi nombre, mon-keigh. Soy Tazarra la Liberadora, Tazarra la Benevolente, la que concede alivio de la asfixiante presa de este mundo. YO decido quién vive, quién muere y quién encuentra una nueva razón de ser en las arenas de Commorragh. A eso has venido, ¿no? ¿A luchar para ganarte mi voluble favor y el privilegio de ser {mf|el primer|la primera} encadenad{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo en este planeta conoce mi nombre, mon-keigh. Soy Tazarra la Liberadora, Tazarra la Benevolente, la que concede alivio de la asfixiante presa de este mundo. YO decido quién vive, quién muere y quién encuentra una nueva razón de ser en las arenas de Commorragh. A eso has venido, ¿no? ¿A luchar para ganarte mi voluble favor y el privilegio de ser {mf|el primer|la primera} encadenad{mf|o|a}?».

languages.text: "Mein Name ist jedem auf diesem Planeten bekannt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich bin Tazarra die Erlöserin, Tazarra die Wohlwollende. Ich gewähre eine kurze Rast vom Würgegriff dieser Welt. Ich entscheide, wer lebt, wer stirbt und wer in den vielen Arenen Commorraghs einen neuen Daseinszweck findet. Darum seid Ihr doch gewiss gekommen, nicht wahr? Um Euch im Kampf meine wankelmütige Gunst zu verdienen und das Privileg, als {mf|Erster|Erste} in Ketten gelegt zu werden?"
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Name ist jedem auf diesem Planeten bekannt, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich bin Tazarra die Erlöserin, Tazarra die Wohlwollende. Ich gewähre eine kurze Rast vom Würgegriff dieser Welt. Ich entscheide, wer lebt, wer stirbt und wer in den vielen Arenen Commorraghs einen neuen Daseinszweck findet. Darum seid Ihr doch gewiss gekommen, nicht wahr? Um Euch im Kampf meine wankelmütige Gunst zu verdienen und das Privileg, als {mf|Erster|Erste} in Ketten gelegt zu werden?"

languages.text: "Bu gezegendeki herkes, ismime aşinadır mon-keigh. Beni hem Kurtarıcı Tazarra hem de Müşfik Tazarra olarak bilirler. Bu dünyanın hükmü altında boğulanlar, benim önderliğimde bir nebze soluklanır. Kimin yaşayıp kimin öleceğine ve Commorragh'ın sayısız arenasında kimlerin yeni amaçlar edineceğine ben karar veririm. Sen de muhakkak bu nedenle buradasın. Her daim değişen lütfumu ve zincire vurulan ilk kişi olma ayrıcalığını kazanmak için savaşmaya geldin, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "My name is known to everyone on this planet, mon-keigh. I am Tazarra the Deliverer, Tazarra the Benevolent, the one who grants respite from the choking grasp of this world. I decide who lives, who dies, and who finds new purpose for their existence in Commorragh's many arenas. Surely this is why you have come here? To fight for my ever-changing favour and for the privilege of being the first to be chained?"
